approval_threshold: group Approval Threshold (number / percentage of Admins that must approve a transaction)

block_delay.minimum: minimum Block delay for Group Transaction Approvals
block_delay.maximum: maximum Block delay for Group Transaction Approvals

group.closed: closed (private) - users need permission to join
group.name: group name

generic.avatar_registered_name: a registered name is required to set an avatar
generic.admin_only: only groups where you are an admin will be shown
generic.already_in_group: you are already in this group!
generic.closed_group: this is a closed/private group, so you will need to wait until an admin accepts your request
generic.encryption_key: the group's first common encryption key is in the process of creation. Please wait a few minutes for it to be retrieved by the network. Checking every 2 minutes...
generic.group_member_list_changed: the group member list has changed. Please re-encrypt the secret key.
generic.group_no_secret_key: there is no group secret key. Be the first admin to publish one!
generic.group_secret_key_no_owner: the latest group secret key was published by a non-owner. As the owner of the group please re-encrypt the key as a safeguard.
generic.invalid_content: invalid content, sender, or timestamp in reaction data
generic.latest_promotion: only the latest promotion from the week will be shown for your group.
generic.loading_members: loading member list with names... please wait.
generic.minter_group: you are currently not part of the MINTER group
generic.mintership_app: visit the Q-Mintership app to apply to be a minter
generic.minting_keys_per_node: only 2 minting keys are allowed per node. Please remove one if you would like to mint with this account.
generic.minting_keys_per_node_different: only 2 minting keys are allowed per node. Please remove one if you would like to add a different account.
generic.node_minting_key: you currently have a minting key for this account attached to this node
generic.not_part_group: you are not part of the encrypted group of members. Wait until an admin re-encrypts the keys.
generic.only_encrypted: only unencrypted messages will be displayed.
generic.only_private_groups: only private groups will be shown
generic.provide_message: please provide a first message to the thread
generic.secure_place: keep your private key in a secure place. Do not share!

error.access_name: cannot send a message without a access to your name
error.group_promotion: error publishing the promotion. Please try again
error.notify_admins: try notifying an admin from the list of admins below:
error.qortals_required: you need at least {{ quantity }} QORT to send a message
error.timeout_reward: timeout waiting for reward share confirmation
error.unable_determine_group_private: unable to determine if group is private

success.group_ban: successfully banned member from group. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.group_creation: successfully created group. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.group_invite: successfully invited {{value}}. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.group_join: successfully requested to join group. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.group_join_request: requested to join Group {{group_name}}: awaiting confirmation
success.group_kick: successfully kicked member from group. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.group_leave: successfully requested to leave group. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.group_member_admin: successfully made member an admin. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.group_promotion: successfully published promotion. It may take a couple of minutes for the promotion to appear
success.group_remove_member: successfully removed member as an admin. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.invitation_cancellation: successfully canceled invitation. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.post_creation: successfully created post. It may take some time for the publish to propagate
success.published_secret_key: published secret key for group {{ group_id }}: awaiting confirmation
success.published_secret_key_label: published secret key for group {{ group_id }}: success!
success.registered_name: successfully registered. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
success.registered_name_label: registered name: awaiting confirmation. This may take a couple minutes.
success.rewardshare_creation: confirming creation of rewardshare on chain. Please be patient, this could take up to 90 seconds.
success.thread_creation: successfully created thread. It may take some time for the publish to propagate
success.unbanned_user: successfully unbanned user. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate
